name: Android Development
postCreateCommand: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y wget unzip openjdk-11-jdk && mkdir -p /usr/local/android-sdk && wget https://dl.google.com/android/repository/commandlinetools-linux-7583922_latest.zip -O /usr/local/android-sdk/cmdline-tools.zip && cd /usr/local/android-sdk && unzip cmdline-tools.zip && mkdir -p cmdline-tools && mv cmdline-tools tools && cd tools/bin && yes | ./sdkmanager --licenses && ./sdkmanager --install 'platforms;android-30' 'build-tools;30.0.3' 'system-images;android-30;google_apis;x86_64' 'emulator' 'platform-tools' && rm /usr/local/android-sdk/cmdline-tools.zip
